qas.question: What is White suffering from when Bond finds him?
How does White deal with his condition?
Where does JAmes find Dr. Swann?
What is Mr. White dying of?
Who does Mr. White ask James Bond to protect?
Who travels to Australia to find Mr. White?
Who is dying of potassium poisoning?
Whose son is abducted by Hinx?

context: <b9_0>Bond<b9_0/> travels to Austria to find <b10_0><b11_0><b12_0>White<b12_0/><b11_0/><b10_0/>, who is dying of <a0_0><a5_0>thallium poisoning<a0_0/>.<a5_0/> He admits to growing disenchanted with Quantum and tells Bond to find and protect <a6_0>his daughter, <a1_0>Dr. Madeline Swann<a6_0/><a1_0/>, who will take him to L'Américain; this will in turn lead him to Spectre. White then <a2_0>commits suicide<a2_0/>. Bond locates Swann at the <a3_0>Hoffler Klinik<a3_0/>, but she is abducted by <a8_0>Hinx.<a8_0/> Bond rescues her and the two meet Q, who discovers that Sciarra's ring links Oberhauser to Bond's previous missions, identifying Le Chiffre, Dominic Greene and Raoul Silva as Spectre agents. Swann reveals that L'Américain is a hotel in <a4_0><a7_0>Tangier<a4_0/>.
